product_name: BIC Sport Stand Up Paddleboard Coiled Leash - Flatwater
long_description: Maintaining a connection to your board without chafing your ankle, the Bic Sport Stand Up Paddleboard Coiled Leash an essential piece of stand up paddleboarding gear. Bic Sport recommends this item as ideally suited to large SUP boards used in touring or flatwater; not suitable for surfing. Rip-and-stick attachments offer personalized adjustments; thick neoprene cuff feels comfortable next to your skin. Swivels and molded fittings increase freedom of motion. "Rail saver" attachment uses a rip-and-stick tab to secure the cord loop.
short_description: Maintaining a connection to your board without chafing your ankle, the Bic Sport Stand Up Paddleboard Coiled Leash an essential piece of stand up paddleboarding gear.
